LanguageData.Projectile_3HST5mmLPRG_Steel.label: Low Power 5mm Railgun bullet (Sabot)
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LPRG.label: 3HST low power railgun
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LPRG.description: Standard service rifle of 3HST slave-fodders. Decreased muzzle velocity and longer rail greatly reduced the stress of power system and rails, allowing cheaper materials to be used on this rifle.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LPRG.tools.0.label: stock

LanguageData.Gun_3HST_LPRG.tools.4.label: energy BayonetPoint
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Assault_Railgun.label: 3HST assault railgun
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Assault_Railgun.description: Standard issue assault rifle of 3HST elven forces.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Assault_Railgun.comps.2.label: Rail durability

LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Light_Machine_Railgun.label: 3HST light machine railgun
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_Light_Machine_Railgun.descripti: Standard issue light machinegun of 3HST planetary forces.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_5mmDMR.label: 3HST designated marksman rifle
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_5mmDMR.description: Small caliber sniper rifle developed by 3HST limited weaponry department.
LanguageData.Gun_3HST_5mmDMR.tools.0.label: stock

LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGmanned.label: Manned 5mm light machine railgun
LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGmanned.description: A 3HST light machine railgun mounted on an stationary mount. Despite the fact this turret is manually operated, this turret still needs a amount of power to operate since railguns consumes power.
LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGAuto.label: Auto 5mm light machine railgun
LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGAuto.description: A permanent defensive structure covered under thick steel armor reinforced by a layer of plasteel surface hardening. While extremely durable and resilent to all but EMP attacks, they're costly to build both in terms of material and time, and being unable to move after construction.
LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGAutoMoveable.label: Auto 5mm light machine railgun
LanguageData.Turret_3HST5mmLMGAutoMoveable.descriptio: A gun, a tripod, and some servos between them. While more fragile and inaccurate than their permanent cousins, they enjoy the versatility of being moveable.
LanguageData.Gun_5mmHMG_TurretManned.label: Mounted 3HST 5mm LMG
LanguageData.Gun_5mmHMG_TurretAuto.label: Mounted 3HST 5mm LMG
